NAME: Log_Level
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Default log level for loggers. Values from LoggingLevel enum class

NAME: Class_DBLogger
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Class name for the database logger

NAME: Classes_STD_Logger
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: A list of class names for standard loggers. Separated by commas (managed by LoggerManager)

NAME: Enabled
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Turn the loggers on if the value is TRUE, FALSE otherwise

NAME: Max_Log_Length
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Maximum length for the log message
